import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import { selectCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { selectCurrentUser } from '../../redux/user/user.selectors' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { HeaderContainer, LogoContainer, OptionDiv, OptionLink, OptionsContainer } from './header.styles' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
{hidden ? null : } ) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
